title: What is the best receiver with WiFi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Terabyte 802 Wi-Fi Receiver 2.4Ghz 802.11B/G/N 300Mbps Usb 2.0 Wireless Wi-Fi Network Adapter is one of the best Wi-Fi Receiver which I have bought from amazon.I am using this Wifi receiver for more than 6 month this is good one with no issue.Great one for its price...it keeps on disconnecting in windows 10..I know its windows problem..Really happy with the product. The device receives signal even from second floor and offers good speed. No hassles faced during installation process.
